::Spears::

"Ah, Striker, Do you think that there might be another way to get 
back to the base other than taking the pod.  A land bridge? Boat? 
Something?"

She was getting more and more nervous as they approachd the pod.

She had flown with Ramulus, but she held her breath most of the trip 
and kept her eyes closed.  She didn't want to go through that panick 
again unless abosolutely nessassary.
